snippet: Founded in 1999, the Chobi Mela International Festival of Photography in Dhaka, Bangladesh, is truly international, showcasing photographers from 23 countries and every continent except Antarctica.
abstract: Founded in 1999, the Chobi Mela International Festival of Photography in Dhaka, Bangladesh, is truly international, showcasing photographers from 23 countries and every continent except Antarctica.

headline.main: From Bangladesh, a Photo Festival Builds Bridges
